= Chip Specs =
    * External Documents
        * Picoblaze docs
        * Xilinx Nexys 4 Artix 7 Board docs
        * RS232 Standard
            * There's electrical standards, but we don't get involved with that
            * RS422 - Differential Drivers and ...
                * only defines electrical
            * RS485
                * Multi-point communication, just electrical
            * For us, RS232 has both electrical and protocol, but we want just the protocol
        * In your spec you don't include everything from the compliant documentation, you just refer to it, and the reader has to go and see it themselves
